name: Roy Tang
text: Region lock settings depend on the publisher. And it's set per game. There should be an indicator on the Steam store page if there are region lock restrictions on a game. See the first image in this link:  https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=1266-QFZC-2141

source_obj.text: Region lock settings depend on the publisher. And it's set per game. There should be an indicator on the Steam store page if there are region lock restrictions on a game. See the first image in this link:  https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=1266-QFZC-2141
